peril.model.states

Class Fortify

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.states.ModelState
        • peril.model.states.Fortify

  • public final class Fortify
extends ModelState
    The logic for the ModelState where current ModelPlayer can select one of their ModelCountrys then another provided that there is a path of friendly ModelCountrys between the two ModelCountry.
    Since:
    2018-03-16
    Version:
    1.01.08
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    ModelState

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fortify()
      Moves one unit from the primary ModelCountry to the secondary ModelCountry along the path between them determined by getPathBetween(ModelCountry, ModelCountry, ModelUnit).
      java.util.List<ModelCountry> getPathBetween(ModelCountry start, ModelCountry target, ModelUnit unit)
      Retrieves the path between two path between two ModelCountrys ruled by the same ModelPlayer that the specified ModelUnit can traverse.
      ModelCountry getPrimary()
      Retrieves the primary selected ModelCountry.

      During the Fortify state the current ModelPlayer can select one of their ModelCountrys then another provided that there is a path of friendly ModelCountrys between the two ModelCountry.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public boolean select(ModelCountry country)
        During the Fortify state the current ModelPlayer can select one of their ModelCountrys then another provided that there is a path of friendly ModelCountrys between the two ModelCountry.
        Specified by:
        select in class ModelState
        Parameters:
        country - The ModelCountry that can be selected.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the specified ModelCountry has been selected by this ModelState.

      • getPathBetween

        public java.util.List<ModelCountry> getPathBetween(ModelCountry start,
                                                   ModelCountry target,
                                                   ModelUnit unit)
        Retrieves the path between two path between two ModelCountrys ruled by the same ModelPlayer that the specified ModelUnit can traverse.
        Parameters:
        start - The ModelCountry where the path will begin.
        target - The ModelCountry where the path will end.
        unit - THe ModelUnit that will be transfered across the path.
        Returns:
        The path of ModelCountrys between the two specified ModelCountrys.

      • fortify

        public void fortify()
        Moves one unit from the primary ModelCountry to the secondary ModelCountry along the path between them determined by getPathBetween(ModelCountry, ModelCountry, ModelUnit).
